jcr:content.jcr:title: If The Beatles Had Read Hunter ... The Singles

contentheadline.headline: If The Beatles Had Read Hunter ... The Singles

contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Album <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> | Name = If The Beatles Had Read Hunter ... The Singles | Type = compilation | Longtype = | Artist = [[The Wonder Stuff]] | Cover = If_The_Beatles_Had_Read_Hunter_The_Wonder_Stuff_Album_Cover.jpg | Released =September 1994; Reaching number 8 | Recorded = | Genre = [[Alternative rock]] | Length = | Label = Polydor | Producer = Pat Collier; Mick Glossop; David Morris & Richard Willis | Last album = ''[[Construction for the Modern Idiot]]'' (1993) | This album = '''''If The Beatles Had Read Hunter ... The Singles''''' (1994) | Next album = ''Live In Manchester'' (1995) }} {{Album ratings |rev1 = [[Allmusic]] |rev1Score = {{Rating|4.5|5}} |rev2 = |rev2Score = }} '''''If The Beatles Had Read Hunter...The Singles''''' (1994) is a singles compilation released after [[The Wonder Stuff]]'s original demise in 1994. The title referred to a quote "that if the writer [[Hunter S. Thompson]] had been a presiding influence over [[The Beatles]], then they might have looked and sounded like The Wonder Stuff"<!-- needs reference -->. ==Track listing== # "Welcome to the Cheap Seats" (2:36) # "A Wish Away" (2:30) # "Caught In My Shadow" (3:34) # "Don't Let Me Down, Gently" (3:02) # "The Size of a Cow" (3:13) # "Hot Love Now!" (3:13) # [[Dizzy_(song)#Vic_Reeves_version|"Dizzy" (Tommy Roe/Freddy Weller)]] (3:19) (Credited to [[Vic Reeves]] and [[The Wonder Stuff]]) # "Unbearable" (2:26) # "Circlesquare" (3:22) # "Who Wants to Be the Disco King?" (2:49) # "Golden Green" (3:02) # "Give, Give, Give Me More, More, More" (2:49) # "[['Coz I Luv You]]" ([[Noddy Holder]]/[[Jim Lea]]) (3:29) (A cover of the band [[Slade]]'s 1971 single) # "Sleep Alone" (3:35) # "Full of Life (Happy Now)" (3:34) # "It's Yer Money I'm After, Baby" (2:48) # "On the Ropes" (3:54) # "It's Not True" (1:58) == References == *[http://www.allmusic.com/album/if-the-beatles-had-read-hunterthe-singles-r1655023 Allmusic review] [[Category:The Wonder Stuff albums]] [[Category:1994 compilation albums]] [[Category:Polydor Records compilation albums]] {{1990s-compilation-album-stub}}
